```{r cars}
library(glue)
library(odbc)
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
library(pool)

#con <- dbPool(drv = odbc::odbc(), dsn = "OAO Cloud DB", timeout = 30)
con <- dbConnect(drv = odbc(), "OAO Cloud DB Production", timeout = 30)
print("con")

drop_query <- glue("DROP TABLE ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE")

date_1 <- "2019-01-01"
date_2 <- Sys.Date() - 1
reg_exp <- "\\[(.*?)\\]"

update_query <- glue("CREATE TABLE ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE  AS 
SELECT CASE WHEN h.DEPT_NAME_DNU like 'X_%' AND TO_CHAR(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM h.APPT_DTTM)) = '2024' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(h.DEPT_NAME_DNU, '^[X_]{2}', 'X_2024_') ELSE h.DEPT_NAME_DNU END AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, h.*, nvl(h.NEW_PT_ARRIVED_RAW, 'ESTABLISHED') AS NEW_PT_ARRIVED, count(*) over () totalRows
FROM( 
SELECT g.*, j.RACE_GROUPER, j.RACE_GROUPER_DETAIL, p.MYCHART_STATUS_GROUPER, m.ETHNICITY_GROUPER,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY g.MRN, g.APPT_DTTM, g.APPT_TYPE, g.PROVIDER, g.APPT_STATUS ORDER BY g.MRN, g.APPT_DTTM, g.APPT_TYPE, g.PROVIDER, g.APPT_STATUS) AS Counts 
FROM( 
        Select a.DEPT_SPECIALTY_NAME, a.PROV_ID AS EPIC_PROVIDER_ID, a.REFERRING_PROV_NAME_WID, a.MRN, a.PAT_NAME AS Patient_Name, a.ZIP_CODE, a.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID,
        a.BIRTH_DATE, a.FINCLASS AS Coverage, a.APPT_MADE_DTTM, a.APPT_DTTM, a.PRC_NAME AS APPT_TYPE, a.APPT_LENGTH AS APPT_DUR, a.DERIVED_STATUS_DESC AS APPT_STATUS, 
        a.APPT_CANC_DTTM, a.CANCEL_REASON_NAME As CANCEL_REASON, a.SIGNIN_DTTM, a.PAGED_DTTM, a.CHECKIN_DTTM, a.ARVL_LIST_REMOVE_DTTM AS ARRIVAL_REMOVE_DTTM, a.ROOMED_DTTM, 
        a.FIRST_ROOM_ASSIGN_DTTM AS ROOM_ASSIGNED_DTTM, a.PHYS_ENTER_DTTM AS PROVIDERIN_DTTM, a.VISIT_END_DTTM, 
        a.CHECKOUT_DTTM, a.TIME_IN_ROOM_MINUTES, a.CYCLE_TIME_MINUTES, a.VISIT_GROUP_NUM AS NEW_PT, a.LOS_NAME AS CLASS_PT, a.APPT_ENTRY_USER_NAME_WID AS APPT_SOURCE, 
        a.ACCESS_CENTER_SCHEDULED_YN AS ACCESS_CENTER, a.VISIT_METHOD, a.VISIT_PROV_STAFF_RESOURCE_C AS RESOURCES, a.PRIMARY_DX_CODE,
        a.REFERRING_PROV_ID,
        TO_CHAR(EXTRACT(year from a.APPT_DTTM)) Appt_Year, 
        TO_CHAR(a.APPT_DTTM, 'DY') AS APPT_DAY, 
        TO_CHAR(a.APPT_DTTM, 'MON') AS Appt_Month, 
        TO_CHAR(a.APPT_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm') AS Appt_Month_Year, 
        trunc(a.APPT_DTTM) AS Appt_Date_Year,
        (a.Appt_DTTM - a.APPT_MADE_DTTM) AS Wait_Time,
        trunc(a.APPT_MADE_DTTM) AS APPT_MADE_DATE_YEAR,
        TO_CHAR(a.APPT_MADE_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm') AS Appt_Made_Month_Year,
        REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.PRC_NAME, 'NEW') AS NEW_PT_SCHEDULED,
        REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.LOS_NAME, 'NEW') AS NEW_PT_ARRIVED_RAW,
        a.LOS_CODE, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS DEPT_NAME_DNU, b.DEPARTMENT_ID, b.SITE, c.ASSOCIATIONLISTA, c.ASSOCIATIONLISTB, c.ASSOCIATIONLISTT, 
        a.PAT_ID,
        c.INPERSONVSTELE, d.DISEASE_GROUP, d.DISEASE_GROUP_B AS DISEASE_GROUP_DETAIL, d.PROVIDER_TYPE, e.DX_DETAIL, e.DX_GROUPER, i.RACE, i.MYCHART_STATUS, z.ETHNIC_BACKGROUND,
        TRIM(TRAILING FROM REGEXP_REPLACE(a.PROV_NAME_WID, '{{reg_exp}}', '')) AS Provider, 
        TRIM(TRAILING FROM REGEXP_REPLACE(a.REFERRING_PROV_NAME_WID, '{{reg_exp}}', '')) AS Referring_Provider 
        FROM MV_DM_PATIENT_ACCESS a 
                            INNER JOIN ONCOLOGY_DEPARTMENT_GROUPINGS b on a.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID and 
                            (a.CONTACT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('{{date_1}} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') 
                            AND TO_DATE('{{date_2}} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') 
                                OR a.APPT_MADE_DTTM BETWEEN TO_DATE('{{date_1}} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
                                AND TO_DATE('{{date_2}} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
                          LEFT JOIN ONCOLOGY_PRC_GROUPINGS c on a.PRC_NAME = c.PRC_NAME 
                          LEFT JOIN ONCOLOGY_DISEASE_GROUPINGS d on a.PROV_ID = d.EPIC_PROVIDER_ID 
                          LEFT JOIN ONCOLOGY_DX_CODES e on a.PRIMARY_DX_CODE = e.PRIMARY_DX_CODE 
                          LEFT JOIN MV_PATIENT_SELECT_DEMOGRAPHICS i on a.PAT_ID = i.PAT_ID
                          LEFT JOIN ONCOLOGY_ETHNIC_BACKGROUND_PULL z on a.PAT_ID = z.PAT_ID
                                      LEFT JOIN ONCOLOGY_LOS_EXCLUSIONS f on a.LOS_CODE = f.LOS_CODE 
                                                                    WHERE f.LOS_CODE IS NULL 
                                                                    
        ) g 
        LEFT JOIN ONCOLOGY_RACE_GROUPER j on LOWER(g.RACE) = LOWER(j.RACE)
        LEFT JOIN ONCOLOGY_MYCHART_STATUS_GROUPER p on LOWER(g.MYCHART_STATUS) = LOWER(p.MYCHART_STATUS)
        LEFT JOIN ONCOLOGY_ETHNICITY_GROUPER m on LOWER(g.ETHNIC_BACKGROUND) = LOWER(m.ETHNIC_BACKGROUND)
    ) h 
WHERE h.Counts = 1", .open = "{{", .close = "}}")

oncology_index <- glue("CREATE index oncology_filter_index on ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE  (SITE, DEPARTMENT_NAME, DX_GROUPER, APPT_DTTM, APPT_DAY)")
oncology_index_date <- glue("CREATE index oncology_filter_index_appt_dttm  on ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE  (APPT_DTTM, DEPARTMENT_NAME)")

#Implementing procedures 
update_columns_ethnicity <- glue("BEGIN fill_na('ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE', 'ETHNICITY_GROUPER',
                                 'ETHNIC_BACKGROUND', 'BLANK/UNKNOWN'); END;")

update_columns_race <- glue("BEGIN fill_na('ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE ', 'RACE', 'RACE', 'BLANK'); END;")

update_columns_race_grouper <- glue("BEGIN fill_na('ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE', 'RACE_GROUPER', 'RACE_GROUPER', 'BLANK/UNKNOWN'); END;")

update_columns_race_detail <- glue("BEGIN fill_na('ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE', 'RACE_GROUPER_DETAIL', 'RACE_GROUPER_DETAIL', 'BLANK/UNKNOWN'); END;")


update_columns_my_chart <- glue("BEGIN fill_na('ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE', 'MYCHART_STATUS_GROUPER', 'MYCHART_STATUS', 'Not Activated'); END;")

update_columns_ref_provider <- glue("BEGIN fill_na('ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE', 'REFERRING_PROVIDER', 'REFERRING_PROVIDER', 'Unknown/Blank'); END;")

update_columns_dx_grouper <- glue("BEGIN fill_na('ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE', 'DX_GROUPER', 'DX_GROUPER', 'Non-Cancer'); END;")

update_columns_dx_detail <- glue("BEGIN fill_na('ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE', 'DX_DETAIL', 'DX_DETAIL', 'Non-Cancer'); END;")

update_columns_new_pt_scheduled <- glue("BEGIN fill_na('ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE', 'NEW_PT_SCHEDULED', 'NEW_PT_SCHEDULED', 'ESTABLISHED'); END;")


update_genetics_infusion <- glue("UPDATE ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE
   SET ASSOCIATIONLISTA = 'Treatment',
   ASSOCIATIONLISTB = 'Treatment Visit',
   ASSOCIATIONLISTT = 'Genetic Infusion',
   INPERSONVSTELE = 'In Person'
 WHERE DEPARTMENT_ID =  '8458037'
")

oncology_filters_tbl <- glue("CREATE TABLE ONCOLOGY_FILTERS_UPDATED AS
SELECT DISTINCT SITE, DEPARTMENT_NAME, PROVIDER, PROVIDER_TYPE, DISEASE_GROUP, DISEASE_GROUP_DETAIL, INPERSONVSTELE, ASSOCIATIONLISTA, ASSOCIATIONLISTB, ASSOCIATIONLISTT, REFERRING_PROVIDER, REFERRING_PROV_ID, DX_GROUPER, APPT_STATUS FROM ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE")

oncology_filters_tbl_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE ONCOLOGY_FILTERS_UPDATED")

oncology_active_treatment_table_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE ONCOLOGY_ACTIVE_TREATMENT_MRN")

oncology_active_treatment_table <- glue ("CREATE TABLE ONCOLOGY_ACTIVE_TREATMENT_MRN AS
SELECT DISTINCT MRN FROM ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE WHERE APPT_STATUS = 'Arrived' AND ASSOCIATIONLISTA = 'Treatment'")

oncology_main_table <- glue("CREATE TABLE ONCOLOGY_ACCESS AS
                            SELECT a.*, b.ACTIVE_MRN FROM ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE a
                            LEFT JOIN ONCOLOGY_ACTIVE_MRN_MAPPING b
                            on a.MRN = b.MRN")

tryCatch({
dbBegin(con)
if(dbExistsTable(con, "ONCOLOGY_ACCESS_BASE")) {
        dbExecute(con,drop_query)
  }
  dbExecute(con,update_query)
  dbExecute(con,oncology_index)
    dbExecute(con,oncology_index_date)
  dbExecute(con,update_columns_ethnicity)
  dbExecute(con,update_columns_race_grouper)
  dbExecute(con,update_columns_race_detail)
  dbExecute(con,update_columns_race)
  dbExecute(con,update_columns_my_chart)
  dbExecute(con,update_columns_ref_provider)
  dbExecute(con,update_columns_dx_grouper)
  dbExecute(con,update_columns_dx_detail)
  dbExecute(con,update_genetics_infusion)
  dbExecute(con,update_columns_new_pt_scheduled)

if(dbExistsTable(con, "ONCOLOGY_ACCESS")) {
        dbExecute(con,"DROP TABLE ONCOLOGY_ACCESS")
}
  dbExecute(con, oncology_main_table)


if(dbExistsTable(con, "ONCOLOGY_ACTIVE_TREATMENT_MRN")) {
        dbExecute(con,oncology_active_treatment_table_drop)
  }
  dbExecute(con,oncology_active_treatment_table)

if(dbExistsTable(con, "ONCOLOGY_FILTERS_UPDATED")) {
        dbExecute(con,oncology_filters_tbl_drop)
  }
dbExecute(con, oncology_filters_tbl)


  dbCommit(con)

  
},
 error = function(err){
    print(err)
    dbRollback(con)
    dbDisconnect(con)
})
print("pool")
```
